name: Axiens
overview: Axiens is a version of Galaxians where you control a ship at the bottom of the screen trying to shoot all the aliens moving across the top of the screen and firing at you. Occasionally one will swoop down zig-zagging and shooting. When all aliens are shot then they appear once more moving faster, shooting more and more aliens swooping down. The joystick is used to control your ship. Released as part of the "Triple Decker 6" and the "Classic Arcadia" game packs.
